channel.title: Items unusable, test items assigned to char
channel.description:
#### What happened? Items have been bugged for me for a while. I bought the Pumpking and the coffin execute and I don't remember having actually ever seen them work. I bought the leather tunic armor a while ago and it worked for a bit. Right now my items show stubs. A sword named something like "super long sword of blah blah" with a Lorem Ipsum for the description.
#### What was SUPPOSED to happen? I should be able to buy and use items seamlessly
#### Steps to reproduce: Log into my account and repro: yup459
#### Comments:

item.title: Items unusable, test items assigned to char
item.dc:creator: Insanity
item.description:
Lythlander:

sword named something like “super long sword of blah blah” with a Lorem Ipsum for the description.

dummy text

I think it also happened to dooku too.

item.title: Items unusable, test items assigned to char

item.description:
What happened?

Items have been bugged for me for a while. I bought the Pumpking and the coffin execute and I don’t remember having actually ever seen them work. I bought the leather tunic armor a while ago and it worked for a bit. Right now my items show stubs. A sword named something like “super long sword of blah blah” with a Lorem Ipsum for the description.

What was SUPPOSED to happen?

I should be able to buy and use items seamlessly

Steps to reproduce:

Log into my account and repro: yup459
